name: PressureUlcerRiskAssessment_SNOMEDCT
title: Pressure Ulcer Risk Assessment_SNOMEDCT
description: Pressure Ulcer Risk Assessment, SNOMED CT, Created for the NDNQI Pressure Ulcer Risk measure.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes  indicating that pressure ulcer risk was assessed. Also includes the name of scales used to assess pressure ulcer risk. Documentation of scale use in the patient record indicates that pressure ulcer risk was performed.),(Data Element Scope: Using the Quality Data Model, this data element will map to "Risk Category/Assessment"),(Inclusion Criteria: Performance of a pressure ulcer risk assessment, Assessment of pressure ulcer risk using the Braden and Norton scales, Use of the Braden Q for pressure ulcer risk assessment.),(Exclusion Criteria: )

concept.display: Assessment using Braden pressure ulcer risk scale (procedure)
Assessment using Norton pressure ulcer risk scale (procedure)

contains.display: Assessment of risk of pressure injury (procedure)
